attributes.action: Stop the closure of Vesta, wind turbine manufacturer, Isle of Wight.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
please support the 600 people who are expecting to be made redundant in august following the closure of vesta.
vesta produce wind turbines used in the production of electricity. a clean, safe, renewable source of power. these blades will now be made outside of the uk and then shipped back to be finished resulting in 600 job losses.
